newsArray.title: Natasa Stankovic's 'Friend' Aleksander Alex Ilic, Responds To Trolls About Him Being A 'Marriage Breaker'
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: New Delhi: Natasa Stankovic has been sharing cryptic posts on social media amid rumours of her separation with cricketer husband Hardik Pandya. Only recently, Disha Patani's rumoured boyfriend Aleksander Alex Ilic was spotted with Natasa Stankovic a few days ago. In response to that, Hardik Pandya fans have taken to trolling Aleksander through his Instagram posts.Netizens trolls Aleksander Alex IlicMany linked him for being the alleged reason behind Natasa Stankovic and Hardik Pandya's split. A user wrote, "Hardik Pandey respect button.‚Äù To this, he replied: ‚Äúhahahah bhai ja ke post check kr lo yha comment krne se phle (go and check the post before commenting).‚Äù View this post on Instagram A post shared by Aleksandar Alex Ilic (@iamaleksandarilic)A user wrote, ‚ÄúChappri button.‚Äù To this, Aleksander wrote back, ‚ÄúYes, you are chapri (laughing face emoticon).‚Äù Another user wrote, ‚ÄúChhapri.‚Äù Aleksander replied, ‚ÄúDo you see yourself?‚ÄùSome users wrote, "Hardik Pandya ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èTera baap hai."‚ÄúHardik Pandya like button aur saath mein isko gali dene wale bhi( those who want to abuse him)," read another comment. To this, he replied, ‚ÄúShould I give you a gali? (wink face emoji)."For those unaware, Aleksander is rumoured to be dating Disha Patani. The model-fitness trainer has often been spotted with Disha Patani on dinner dates. Hardik Pandya, Natasa Stankovic separation rumoursOn the other hand, there has been quite some speculation about Hardik and Natasa's relationship. The speculation began with a Reddit post when a user commented that Natasa had dropped Hardik Pandya's surname from her Instagram handle. Natasa was later seen with Aleksander Alex Ilic on a coffee date. However, she did not comment about divorce rumours when the paparazzi asked her. Natasa Stankovic and Hardik Pandya tied the knot on May 31, 2020. They welcomed their first child, son Agastya on July 30 of the same year. They renewed their wedding vows amid close family and friends on February 14, 2023, in Udaipur, Rajasthan.Also Read: Amid Divorce Rumors, Natasa Stankovic Unarchives Her Wedding Pictures With Hardik Pandya
